issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
create a ticket add ti info  and ti config outputs as files and a picture (png)

h3. Actual Result
the result in the picture

h3. Expected Result
new ticket
fields.summary: Imposible to create a Ticket from Titanium witk files

comments.body: I submitted a JIRA ticket (TC-3993) using Titanium Studio 3.2.1 and it was created successfully so I am unable to reproduce the issue with a simple report. I suspect it may be due to the content in one of the form fields as indicated by the error dialog. I would appreciate if you can provide the content of your form as this error is related to one of the characters in your error report.
